data.description:
Éditions CEC inc. and Protéus VR inc. present myZoneLAB, an application that enables virtual laboratories in science classrooms.  
myZoneLAB lets you : 
- freely manipulate laboratory tools and follow numerous protocols;
- obtain valid results ;  
- compile and e-mail results. 
Experiments can take place in virtual or augmented reality, and can be streamed instantly for large-group sharing.
Experiments can take place in virtual or augmented reality, and can be streamed instantly for large-group sharing. 
With maZoneLAB, laboratories become accessible to all, with no worries about the availability of equipment, resources or premises...and no security issues! 
Further details: 
myZoneLAB is available with the Origins, Interactions and Elements collections from Éditions CEC inc.

changelog.change_log: September 6, 2024 // Proteus Labs v.300 / maZoneLab v.150 // Target: Meta Quest runtime: 68 // Fixed funnel & gas transfer
September 5, 2024 // Proteus Labs v.299 / maZoneLab v.149 // Target: Meta Quest runtime: 68 // Fixed funnel & liquid transfer // Fixed osmosis
September 4, 2024 // Proteus Labs v.297 / maZoneLab v.148 // Target: Meta Quest runtime: 68 // Fixed hand tracking interactions // Fixed syringe with hand tracking
Sept 3rd, 2024 //  Proteus Labs v.296  / maZoneLab v.147 // Target: Meta Quest runtime: 68 // Improved general performance // Fixed gas behaviour // Improved hands occlusion
